name: tustopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c3)))

stmt.origin: syl5eq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c3), cfv(cutop, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c3)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cutop, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→ c2 =(TopOpen ` c3))
⊣ c2 =(unifTop ` c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c3))

stmt.origin: simp3d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c3)))
stmt.pretty: simp3d(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), (unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c3), c1 =(Base ` c3), c0 =(UnifSet ` c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c3)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c3))))
body.pretty:

⊣ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(c1 =(Base ` c3)∧ c0 =(UnifSet ` c3)∧(unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c3)))

cumulated.pretty:

-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctus, c0))

comment: The topology induced by a constructed uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Dec-2017.)
